title: Edelweiss Alt completes acquisition of L&T Infra Development Projs for Rs 6,000 cr
description: Edelweiss Alternatives has completed a Rs 6,000 crore deal to acquire L&T Infrastructure Development Projects (LTIDPL), a joint venture owned by L&T and Canada Pension Plan Investment Board. The acquisition will give Edelweiss 100% ownership in the joint venture, which will include seven road assets and a 960 circuit km power transmission line.
